SEARCH
Package grafiosch.gtnet.handler.impl

Class OfflineAnnouncementHandler

java.lang.Object
grafiosch.gtnet.handler.AbstractGTNetMessageHandler
grafiosch.gtnet.handler.AbstractAnnouncementHandler
grafiosch.gtnet.handler.impl.OfflineAnnouncementHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
GTNetMessageHandler
@Component public class OfflineAnnouncementHandler extends AbstractAnnouncementHandler
Handler for GT_NET_OFFLINE_ALL_C messages. Processes offline announcements from remote servers. The remote server has gone offline and it is unknown when it will be back online. This may be a restart or a shutdown. Updates the remote GTNet server state to closed for all entity kinds.

  • Method Details

    • getSupportedMessageCode

      public GTNetMessageCode getSupportedMessageCode()
      Description copied from interface: GTNetMessageHandler
      Returns the primary message code this handler is responsible for. For handlers supporting multiple codes, this returns the first/primary code. Override GTNetMessageHandler.getSupportedMessageCodes() to register all supported codes.

    • processAnnouncementSideEffects

      protected void processAnnouncementSideEffects(GTNetMessageContext context, GTNetMessage storedMessage)
      Description copied from class: AbstractAnnouncementHandler
      Processes announcement-specific side effects. Called after the announcement is stored. Use for operations like:
      • Updating GTNet server state (e.g., mark as maintenance)
      • Scheduling local tasks based on announcement content
      • Revoking previously granted permissions
      Specified by:
      processAnnouncementSideEffects in class AbstractAnnouncementHandler
      Parameters:
      context - the message context
      storedMessage - the persisted announcement message
